ygData.subject: RE: Saving Private Sereph + Guk stuff(all must read the Guk part!!!)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sigh, as I ve said many times, I regret putting 20 stats point on STR when I create Ziltus, for f**k?  Knn I m not creating a labour worker ;( Anyway, my
ygData.messageBody:
> Next, int value of these nukers, so that I can plan what time you guys
> should nuke (remember guk has a high spawn rate. Nuking on site is too
> mana ineffective)
> Ziltus

Sigh, as I've said many times, I regret putting 20 stats point on STR when
I create Ziltus, for f**k? Knn I'm not creating a labour worker ;(
Anyway, my buffed INT is 111.
Kellendil, what are the best INT stuffs u can make now? I need them badly,
esp earrings (wtf I'm wearing AGI earring? I'm not a sand bag, hehe).

> Wis base casters don't need to report. See your face knows how much mana
> you have already.

Hahahahahaahahaha!

> Function of this guy? If a big train is started, this guy will be
> responsible of taunting the WHOLE train, and die, while the rest
> gate/run out.

Monk willl be the best candidate since they can feign death, plus they
carry very few items. So cannot retrieve coprse also nmind, hahahahah ;-P

> For the 20+ group, I'll volunteer for this since I get a incredible 50%
> exp bonus while in a full group and my area effect DOT songs can taunt
> like no tomorrow. For the other 2, decide who gets to die among
> yourself.

Huh? Not 25% extra xp bonus meh? 50%?

> Now on supplies. The 2 magician and 3(2 if Neriss go MIA) wis base
> casters will be required to provide enought supplies to last the whole
> gang. Nicademous, Kenven and Kellendil can help them out by going into
> Grobb and I and Sunblade can forage a bit to help out.

Actually if possible, I would like to bring flyingfox (lvl 21 magi),
deadflower (lvl 19 bard) and Ling (lvl 24 wiz) along. They are my hunting
buddies for pretty long time and very trust-worthy. Of coz, priority will
be given to locals 1st, just in case we have slots to put them in ;)

> Spell casters, please remember to get 100 each of your spell components.
> 200+ for pet reagents to be KS.

100??? How long we going to stay there? I buy 40 of my spell reagents
each time and can last for a week or so. Wt and cost is one thing. I'm so
damn poor after buying the 5 lvl 24 teleport scrolls and in the end have to
borrow money from Ling to get the 5th scroll, where got cash to buy so many
cat eye agate? ;(

> No alpha loot will be in place. Instead, auto split will be turn on, and
> 1 person of each group will be delicated to looting everything. Please
> report whatever you get to all 3 groups. We will decide by vote who
> requires the item the most and hand it to him/her first.

Sugestion: I'm not sure how this single looter works, but sometime pple dun
bother to loot those rusty weaps and cheap stuffs. It's also impractical
for the single looter to loot everything on sight. Maybe looters just loot
those better stuffs and leave the cheapo stuffs like rusty for others to
free loot (poor wise like me even loot animal skin or bat wing leh). FYI,
even if auto split is turn on, auto split DO NOT split the coin evenly.
The person who loot the coins will be much more than other individuals in
the group, not sure if this is a bug but 101% confirm.

> This event will be a 2 day, 3 night event. We will make our way to guk
> on Saturday night and fight from Saturday night to National day. When TV
> showing fire works, those present will atempt to choing the frogloc
> paladin if we gather enough force, and no one is camping the goon.

I hope I can join most of the time, Aug is a very heavy work load month for
me. Maybe have to work on National Day ;(

Ziltus, power training at Lake Rathetear for the coming Guk expedition.
